entry.title: $2600 // *** NO FEE *** BESSDAN LUXURY UNITS *** NEAR SUBWAY ***
entry.content:
*** NO FEE *** BESSDAN LUXURY UNITS *** NEAR SUBWAY ***

Listing ID #: 168865
Price: $2,600
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0

Building Amenities

Bicycle Room
Elevator
Garage
Laundry
New Construction
Receiving Room
Storage
Subway
Wheelchair Access

Located in the heart of Astoria. Steps from the 30th Avenue cafe, bars, and subway. Just 7 minutes from Midtown Manhattan. Bessdan offers One and Two bedroom residences. All units feature ceramic tiling throughout. Designer kitchens with open island kitchens. Finished with Caesar stone counters and stainless steel appliances including a refrigerator, dishwasher, gas stove, and microwave. Open views with abundant natural lighting in all rooms. The baths are tiled to the ceiling and finished with a white lacquer vanity and deep soaking tub. Central heating and cooling throughout. Tenants pay their utilities. Balcony's and terraces are available on select units. Secure video entry and surveillance cameras throughout the building. Amenities include a furnished roofdeck with stunning NYC views. Fitness room with LCD display screens. Private parking. Laundry. Elevator. And storage.

Contact Andreas Kambanis your Astoria, Long Island City specialist today for a viewing. CELL: 917-731-1729 Email: Andreas@BouklisGroup.com [email protected]
